column3: “Really good strain that’s inexpensive at most dispensaries. Gets you ripped and you stay up for much longer than a lot of other strains. It’s dank bud that hits you like a wave of chill. You’re relaxed, content, & talkative. You can get things done because you feel euphoric but not sleepy. Your body will feel as if it is floating on air.”
“Strain is amazing on so many levels, tastes really musty similar to a lemon taste and smell. You can feel the high faster than any other strain I’ve tried🗣FACTS”
